title: Full Stack Developer for E-commerce Platform
description: We are looking for an experienced full stack developer to build a modern e-commerce platform with React and Node.js. The project includes payment integration, user authentication, and admin dashboard.

title: Mobile App UI/UX Design
description: Need a talented UI/UX designer to create modern, user-friendly designs for our fitness tracking mobile app. Must have experience with mobile design patterns and Figma.

title: Content Writer for Tech Blog
description: Looking for a skilled content writer to produce high-quality articles about web development, AI, and emerging technologies. Must have strong SEO knowledge.

title: Python Backend Developer for AI Integration
description: Seeking an experienced Python developer to integrate AI models into our existing platform. Experience with FastAPI, machine learning, and cloud deployment required.

title: WordPress Website Redesign
description: Need a WordPress expert to redesign our company website. Must be responsive, SEO-friendly, and include a blog section with custom post types.

title: Video Editor for YouTube Content
description: Looking for a creative video editor for our tech YouTube channel. Must be proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve. Weekly content required.
